themes.name: Geopolitical Tensions and Trade Policy
themes.description: Ongoing geopolitical tensions, particularly related to tariffs and trade conflicts, are likely to impact market sentiment and sector performance. Companies with significant international exposure may face headwinds, while domestic-focused firms could benefit.

themes.name: AI and Automation Adoption
themes.description: The acceleration of AI and automation technologies across various sectors is transforming operational efficiencies and driving new business models. Companies investing in AI capabilities are expected to outperform.

themes.name: Sustainability and Energy Transition
themes.description: The shift towards renewable energy and sustainable practices is gaining momentum, driven by regulatory support and consumer demand. Companies in clean energy, electric vehicles, and sustainable materials are poised for growth.

themes.name: Healthcare Innovation and Biotech Advancements
themes.description: Continued innovation in healthcare and biotechnology, including advancements in personalized medicine and telehealth, is expected to drive growth in the sector. Companies with strong R&D pipelines will be key players.

themes.name: Infrastructure Investment and Modernization
themes.description: Increased government spending on infrastructure projects is anticipated, focusing on transportation, broadband, and utilities. Companies involved in construction, materials, and technology solutions for infrastructure are likely to benefit.

themes.name: Consumer Behavior Shifts Post-Pandemic
themes.description: Changes in consumer behavior, including increased online shopping and demand for convenience, are reshaping retail and service industries. Companies adapting to these trends through digital transformation are expected to thrive.

themes.name: Financial Sector Resilience Amid Economic Uncertainty
themes.description: Despite recent market volatility, the financial sector may present opportunities as undervalued stocks emerge. Regulatory changes and interest rate adjustments will influence performance in this sector.

themes.name: Demographic Shifts and Aging Population
themes.description: The aging population in the U.S. is driving demand for healthcare services, retirement planning, and related sectors. Companies catering to this demographic are likely to see sustained growth.
